titles: A defence of the Duke of Buckingham, against the answer to his book, and the reply to his letter by the author of the late Considerations.
author: Penn, William, 1644-1718.
notes: Attributed to William Penn. cf. NUC pre-1956 v. 448, p. 405.
This item appears at reels 735:10 and 1255:16.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
keywords: Buckingham, George Villiers, --  Duke of, 1628-1687. --  Short discourse upon the reasonableness of men's having a religion.
Short answer to His Grace the D. of Buckingham's paper.
